coza.opencollab.synthesis.service.api.util.impl

Class DomHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • coza.opencollab.synthesis.service.api.util.impl.DomHelper

  • public final class DomHelper
extends Object
    This abstract class contains some convenience methods for the converters.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    OpenCollab

      • createDocument

        public static org.dom4j.Document createDocument(String xml)
        Builds the document from the xml given.
        Parameters:
        xml - The xml string.
        Returns:
        a Document object.
        Throws:
        SynthesisException - If the xml could not be parsed to a document.

      • getElement

        public static org.dom4j.Element getElement(org.dom4j.Node node,
                           String xpath)
                                    throws SynthesisException
        Retrieve the element from the document/element/node given the path.

        Note: The xpath must be correct for a single element.

        Parameters:
        node - The node to do the xpath on
        xpath - a String object.
        Returns:
        The element.
        Throws:
        SynthesisException - if any.

      • getElements

        public static List<org.dom4j.Element> getElements(org.dom4j.Node node,
                                  String xpath)
                                           throws SynthesisException
        Retrieve the list of elements from the document/element/node given the path.

        Note: The xpath must be correct for elements of the document.

        Parameters:
        node - The node to do the xpath on
        xpath - a String object.
        Returns:
        The elements.
        Throws:
        SynthesisException - if any.

      • getAttributeAsDate

        public static Date getAttributeAsDate(org.dom4j.Element element,
                      String attribute)
        Retrieve a attribute value from a node as a date. Note that the attribute value must be time in millis.
        Parameters:
        element - The element.
        attribute - The attribute name.
        Returns:
        a Date object.
